flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • Thin Cylinder Supports
  • Magnet Holder
  • Sensor Holder
  • Leg Holders (2)
  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (3)
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • Thin Cylinder Supports
  • Magnet Holder
  • Sensor Holder
  • Leg Holders (2)
  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (3)
Tools
  • 1 1/8" Wrenches
  • Welder

lines.text: Install the thin cylinder supports by screwing the bolt in with an extra nut on it as shown, and placing the u-channel against the cylinder.
lines.text_raw: Install the thin cylinder supports by screwing the bolt in with an extra nut on it as shown, and placing the u-channel against the cylinder.

lines.text: Get both of them snug so the cylinder is centered with pressure on each side.
lines.text_raw: Get both of them snug so the cylinder is centered with pressure on each side.

lines.text: Tighten down the nut to lock it.
lines.text_raw: Tighten down the nut to lock it.

lines.text: Install the magnet holder onto the press foot.
lines.text_raw: Install the magnet holder onto the press foot.

lines.text: The flatbar needs to be parallel with the verticals.
lines.text_raw: The flatbar needs to be parallel with the verticals.

lines.text: Lock it down with the nut.
lines.text_raw: Lock it down with the nut.

lines.text: Install the 6" sensor holder so the end of it  is overlapping the path of the magnet  holder as shown. The other sensor holder will be installed later.
lines.text_raw: Install the 6" sensor holder so the end of it  is overlapping the path of the magnet  holder as shown. The other sensor holder will be installed later.

lines.text: Position them on the upper horizontal members as shown.
lines.text_raw: Position them on the upper horizontal members as shown.

lines.text: Use the location of the roller guides to insure you attach them to the right side.
lines.text_raw: Use the location of the roller guides to insure you attach them to the right side.

lines.text: Insure they are square in all directions
lines.text_raw: Insure they are square in all directions

lines.text: Weld them to the horizontal members fully.
lines.text_raw: Weld them to the horizontal members fully.

guide.summary: Install small components on your Compressed Earth Brick Press.
guide.title: CEB Main Frame: Install Small Components
